channel.title: Policy & Security Think Tank Updates
channel.description: Custom RSS feed from CSIS, CFR, and other policy institutions

item.title: CSIS Global Health Policy Center Names Ambassador Lisa Carty Non-Resident Senior Adviser
item.description: The Center for Strategic and International Studies (CSIS) today announced that Ambassador (retired) Lisa Carty has been appointed as a non-resident senior adviser with the CSIS Global Health Policy Center (GHPC).
